dict.acceptation: 美元；一元纸[硬]币；金钱；财富；

sent.orig: Increase rate of depreciation of the dollar to dollar-denominated price of the product will be.
sent.trans: 美元贬值幅度加大，以美元计价的产品就会涨价。

sent.orig: Reserve this week announced announced a new training dollar trillion-dollar plan to fight the resessionrecession.
sent.trans: 美联储这周公布了一个新的万亿计划来应对经济衰退。

sent.orig: How non-US dollar assets ratio is not known, the size of U.S. dollar assets are traceable.
sent.trans: 非美元资产占比如何不得而知，美元资产的规模却有迹可循。

sent.orig: We also have half-dollar and one-dollar coins.
sent.trans: 接待员： 我们还有五毛和一元的硬币。

sent.orig: A woman will pay one dollar for a two-dollar item she doesn't want.
sent.trans: 女人会花一块钱去买价值两块钱的东西，即使她用不着。
